visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The x-axis categories represent months from January to December, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius, starting from -50. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes monthly average temperature data. The series color is set to a custom color (#FF6347). The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
